text:
Hi,

Trying out the admin webapp, I found that though I could add a new context, the
context wasn't actually available until I restarted Tomcat.

If none of the changes take effect until a restart, then the admin webapp is
nothing more than a glorified text editor!


--Jeff
creator: jeff@socialchange.net.au

This report is really incomplete. I think this works for me; if there's a
